desc: 1-800-PREPARE is your one stop shop for Survival Kits, Disaster Kits and Survival Gear. Having a Survival Kit can help you be prepared for a natural or man-made disaster.

layout.text: Every survival kit has a story

No one knows when a disaster might strike. Whether it’s a natural or man-made disaster in your area, having basic supplies will help ensure safety and survival for yourself and the people important to you.
